nsp.impl

Class Disperser_Continuous2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • nsp.impl.Disperser_Continuous2D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Disperser

    public class Disperser_Continuous2D
extends java.lang.Object
implements Disperser
    Generates a spread of Coordinates based on a combination of angle, distance and number distributions.
